t: Should I remove the plastic on my box spring? The bed is in the basement bedroom and when it was delivered 4 years ago they left the plastic on the box spring. The bed constantly slides around, so are there any benefits of leaving it on? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 5): Most definitely, yes, you can remove it. It’s supposed to be removed. They left it on because it was new and leaving the plastic on would prove they didn’t stain it if you later claimed it was damaged. Take it off and enjoy your now non-sliding bed mattress.
